explains: n. 绿皮西葫芦（又名意大利青瓜）

sentences.en: Aim to have some vegetables—tomatoes, carrots, zucchini, spinach and other greens, for example—with every meal.
sentences.cn: 每餐都有意识地吃些蔬菜——例如，西红柿、胡萝卜、西葫芦、菠菜和其它蔬菜。

sentences.en: If you really want to eat fruits or vegetables before runs, zucchini, tomatoes, olives, grapes, and grapefruit are all low in fiber.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的想在跑步前吃水果或蔬菜，西葫芦、西红柿、橄榄、葡萄和葡萄柚都是低纤维的。

sentences.en: One weekend, he planted tomatoes, zucchini, cucumbers, and eggplant-enough to feed his family of four for the summer, or so he thought.
sentences.cn: 在一个周末，他种了西红柿、西葫芦、黄瓜和茄子，他想，这些足够一家四口过一个夏天了。
